Cardano to Cardano
POST
https://uexswap.com/api/partners/swap/initiate-cardano-to-cardano
Initiates a swap order on the Cardano blockchain and returns an unsigned transaction (in CBOR format) for signing. All inputs are validated before creation. The returned CBOR data must be signed by the user's wallet to complete the swap.
Request

Body



application/json

Payload to create a new token order, including all necessary details such as token type, amount, recipient address, and any relevant metadata required to initiate the order.
buyer_address
string
required
Blockchain address of the buyer who initiates the swap or transaction. Typically, this is the same as the recipient_address unless you want to send the swapped tokens to a different wallet.
Example:
addr1qx8wcywmx3yl9pm7zv8n70fyyyj3974j5fpx3dmkgrjr5r86feva6e0vwcu204vs9l68t6um5puaalmhf82vsw3sax0sk5vjtq
recipient_address
string
required
Destination blockchain address where the output tokens will be sent after the swap. Usually, it is the same as the buyer_address unless you want to send tokens to a different wallet.
Example:
addr1vxur7e6mrayscnprz3thfztgf0qhjxaxh96trvy8vyjl6jg3ehh7k
token_in
string
required
Token ID or asset identifier representing the asset to swap from. Use an empty string ("") to specify ADA, the native Cardano cryptocurrency.
token_out
string
required
Token ID or asset identifier representing the asset the buyer wants to swap to. Use an empty string ("") to specify ADA, the native Cardano token.
Example:
a00fdf4fb9ab6c8c2bd1533a2f14855edf12aed5ecbf96d4b5f5b9394334
amount
number<float>
required
Amount of token_in (or ADA if token_in is empty) that the buyer wants to swap.
Example:
1
slippage
number<float>
required
Maximum acceptable slippage percentage to protect from price volatility during swap (e.g., 5%).
Example:
5
blacklisted_dexes
array[string]
required
List of decentralized exchanges (DEXes) to exclude from routing during the swap. By default, the following DEXes are excluded: CERRA, MUESLISWAP, GENIUS, SNEKFUN, SPECTRUM, AXO. You can specify additional DEXes to exclude by adding them to this list.
Example:
["CERRA","MUESLISWAP","GENIUS","SNEKFUN","SPECTRUM","AXO"]
available_user_ada
number<float>
required
Amount of ADA available on the user's wallet for fees or swap.
Example:
15
ref_code
string
required
ref_code: Referral code to credit partners or affiliates. To get your referral code:Show all...
Example:
5drfo01pgq88
Responses

200
400
403
Order created and CBOR generated successfully. Please review the transaction details carefully and sign the transaction on the frontend to complete the process.
Body



application/json

responses
/
200

boolean
Overall success status of the order creation process.
Example:
true

cbor
object
ontains data related to the CBOR-encoded transaction.

boolean
Status of the CBOR generation step.
Example:
true
cbor
string
CBOR-encoded transaction data (hex or base64 string) to be signed by the frontend client.
Example:

txHash
string
Hash of the blockchain transaction associated with this order, used for verification.Show all...
Example:
56f59d11a4ed048dcc8907308ddc6459939a9bb7ff45495069c993cb1e719ac3
message
string
Informational message prompting the user to sign the transaction on the frontend.
Example:
Order created and CBOR generated successfully. Please sign the transaction on the frontend.
curl --request POST \
  --url https://uexswap.com/api/partners/swap/initiate-cardano-to-cardano \
  --header 'Accept: application/json' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
  "buyer_address": "addr1qx8wcywmx3yl9pm7zv8n70fyyyj3974j5fpx3dmkgrjr5r86feva6e0vwcu204vs9l68t6um5puaalmhf82vsw3sax0sk5vjtq",
  "recipient_address": "addr1vxur7e6mrayscnprz3thfztgf0qhjxaxh96trvy8vyjl6jg3ehh7k",
  "token_in": "string",
  "token_out": "a00fdf4fb9ab6c8c2bd1533a2f14855edf12aed5ecbf96d4b5f5b9394334",
  "amount": 1,
  "slippage": 5,
  "blacklisted_dexes": [
    "CERRA",
    "MUESLISWAP",
    "GENIUS",
    "SNEKFUN",
    "SPECTRUM",
    "AXO"
  ],
  "available_user_ada": 15,
  "ref_code": "5drfo01pgq88"
}'
{
  "status": true,
  "cbor": {
    "status": true,
    "cbor": "",
    "txHash": "56f59d11a4ed048dcc8907308ddc6459939a9bb7ff45495069c993cb1e719ac3"
  },
  "message": "Order created and CBOR generated successfully. Please sign the transaction on the frontend."
}
